column2: "Um... I was wondering if you knew a way to get by without fighting any enemies?"
"Quit ARKS... Well, that would work, but I don't really have any other options..."
"I wasn't any good at anything else, but it turned out I have the talent to join ARKS, so..."
"...Since there's nothing else I can do, I wanted to try and stay in ARKS without having to fight anything."
"I know. That's impossible, isn't it... Sorry for wasting your time."
